title: Retrieve the details of a single listing
description: Retrieves the details of a single listing, in a format suitable for editing. This API only works if you are the seller of the listing.
permission_required: MyTradeMeRead: Read your membership & listing data.

fields.name: Category
fields.description: The ID of the category to list the item in. For example, specify "6853" to list an oil heater. This field also accepts the MCAT category format (e.g. "0004-0370-0560-6853-"). Ignored when listing from the DVD/Blu-ray catalogue.

fields.name: Title
fields.description: The title of the listing. Maximum of 80 characters for Marketplace categories, 50 for the other businesses. Mandatory for most categories. In some categories (e.g. used cars, motorbikes, flatmates wanted) the title is based on one or more attributes. In these categories the title is optional, and is ignored if it is supplied. Not required when listing from the DVD/Blu-ray catalogue.

fields.name: Subtitle
fields.description: The subtitle of the listing. Optional. Maximum of 50 characters.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: A plain text description of the listing. Use CRLF to insert a new line. Mandatory for all auction types except DVD and Blu-ray catalogue listings. Maximum length of 5100 characters for job listings, 5200 characters for property listings and 2048 characters for all others.

fields.name: StartPrice
fields.description: The start price of the listing. Mandatory for auctions. Must be a minimum of 50c and must be less than or equal to the ReservePrice. For most classifieds this value is optional: if specified it is the value that is displayed as the ‘Asking price’. A notable exception to this rule are business for sale classifieds. Not used for property listings (subcategories of category 350); use the PropertyPricePrice attribute instead.

fields.name: ReservePrice
fields.description: The reserve price of the listing. Optional. If supplied, it must be a minimum of 50c and it must be greater than or equal to the StartPrice. Only applicable to auctions, ignored for classifieds.

fields.name: BuyNowPrice
fields.description: The Buy Now price of the listing. Optional. Must be a minimum of 50c, must be greater than or equal to the StartPrice. For Buy Now Only auctions quantity and shipping information must be specified. See Quantity and IsFlatShippingCharge. Only applicable to auctions, ignored for classifieds.

fields.name: Duration
fields.description: The duration of the listing. Mandatory. Must be one of the durations available as per the category details API. Can be a fixed duration or a specified end time.

enum.name: EndDate
enum.description: An end date will be used to set the duration.

enum.name: EightyFour
enum.description: 84 days (Commercial for Sale, Commercial for Lease, New Homes only).

enum.name: HundredSixtyEight
enum.description: 168 days (Commercial for Sale, Commercial for Lease only).

enum.name: UntilWithdrawn
enum.description: until withdrawn (only available for agents outside of the services category)

fields.name: EndDateTime
fields.description: The date and time the listing should close. Ignored unless Duration is set to EndDate.

fields.name: Pickup
fields.description: Indicates whether the buyer can (or is required to) pick-up the item. For auctions any value other than Demand implies that at least one shipping option must be provided. For classifieds this value is ignored.

enum.name: None
enum.description: The listing allows pick up, but does not require it.

enum.name: Allow
enum.description: The buyer can pickup if they so choose.

enum.name: Demand
enum.description: The buyer must pickup the item.

enum.name: Forbid
enum.description: The buyer cannot pickup the item (delivery only).

fields.name: PickupSuburbId
fields.description: If the buyer can (or is required to) pick-up the item then this field can be used to specify the pick-up suburb id. It uses the three-tier region/district/suburb system. Optional. Only applicable to auctions, ignored for classifieds.

fields.name: IsBrandNew
fields.description: Indicates whether the listing is for a brand new item. Optional, defaults to false. Only applicable to auctions, ignored for classifieds.

fields.name: AuthenticatedMembersOnly
fields.description: Determines if only authenticated members can bid on the listing. Only applicable to auctions, ignored for classifieds.

fields.name: IsClassified
fields.description: Determines if this listing is a classified or an auction. Optional, defaults to false. Some categories support auctions, some support classifieds and some accept both types. Use the category details API to check which types a category supports.

fields.name: OpenHomes
fields.description: A list of upcoming open home times. Currently only applies to residential for sale (category 3399) and lifestyle (category 9120) listings.

fields.name: Start
fields.type:
Start 
 DateTime 

The date and time the open home is open for viewing. The date must be in the future and it must be less than 56 days from the current date. Specify dates in the UTC time zone.



 End 
 DateTime 

The date and time the open home is no longer open for viewing. Must be the same day as Start.
fields.description: DateTime

fields.name: Start
fields.description: The date and time the open home is open for viewing. The date must be in the future and it must be less than 56 days from the current date. Specify dates in the UTC time zone.

fields.name: End
fields.description: The date and time the open home is no longer open for viewing. Must be the same day as Start.

fields.name: SendPaymentInstructions
fields.description: Determines if only the payment instructions are sent at the end of the listing Specifies if automatic payment instructions email will be sent to the winner of the auction. Optional, defaults to false.

fields.name: OtherPaymentMethod
fields.description: If the list of payment methods includes Other then this field can be used to specify the name of the payment method. Optional. Only applicable to auctions that have the Other payment method.

fields.name: IsOrNearOffer
fields.description: Specifies if ‘ONO’ should be displayed with price on listing. Optional. Applicable only to classified listings.

fields.name: IsPriceOnApplication
fields.description: Specifies that the price should be displayed as "Price on Application". Optional. Applicable only to businesses for sale listings (subcategories of category 36).

fields.name: IsBold
fields.description: Applies the bold promotion onto the listing. Only permitted in categories that support bold. Whether or not it’s available in a category can be confirmed using the Fees API endpoint. Note that a discount may be applicable if all the feature combo promotions are specified (feature, bold, highlight and gallery). Also note that promotions cannot be removed from a listing.

fields.name: IsFeatured
fields.description: Applies the feature promotion onto the listing. Only permitted in categories that support this promotion. Whether or not it’s available in a category can be confirmed using the Fees API endpoint. Note that a discount may be applicable if all the feature combo promotions are specified (feature, bold, highlight and gallery). Also note that promotions cannot be removed from a listing.

fields.name: IsHomepageFeatured
fields.description: *deprecated*

fields.name: HasGallery
fields.description: Applies the gallery promotion onto the listing. Only permitted in categories that support this promotion. Whether or not it’s available in a category can be confirmed using the Fees API endpoint. Note that a discount may be applicable if all the feature combo promotions are specified (feature, bold, highlight and gallery). Also note that promotions cannot be removed from a listing.

fields.name: HasGalleryPlus
fields.description: Applies the gallery plus promotion onto the listing. Only permitted in categories that support this promotion. Whether or not it’s available in a category can be confirmed using the Fees API endpoint. This promotion cannot be applied to a listing that already has the gallery promotion. Note that promotions cannot be removed from a listing.

fields.name: Quantity
fields.description: For Buy Now Only auctions this is the quantity of items that are available for sale. Optional. Can be between 1 and 1000. Setting the quantity (even to 1) will prevent bidding and make a listing only purchasable via Buy Now. Note that when editing, the value must be less than or equal to 1000 - (quantity sold). The quantity sold for a listing can be calculated by adding up all the QuantitySold values from the listing details response.

fields.name: IsFlatShippingCharge
fields.description: For Buy Now Only auctions this specifies if the shipping is one rate for multiple quantities. If false is specified the winning bidder will be charged the shipping rate multiplied by the quantity of items purchased. If true is specified one flat shipping rate is charged. Only applicable for auctions, ignored for classifieds.

fields.name: HasAgreedWithLegalNotice
fields.description: Specifies if the user has read and agreed with the legal notice relevant to the category the listing is being created in. The category details API can be used to retrieve the legal notice for a specific category (only applies to certain categories, such as the category 6327 - Carbon Credits).

fields.name: HomePhoneNumber
fields.description: Home phone number to be displayed on listing. Optional. Only applicable in categories where the user has paid a listing fee. Must be 9 digits long and use a valid area code. Can be specified but will only be displayed when category permits.

fields.name: MobilePhoneNumber
fields.description: Mobile phone number to be displayed on listing. Optional. Only applicable in categories where the user has paid a listing fee. Must be 8 or 9 digits long. Can be specified but will only be displayed when category permits.

fields.name: IsHighlighted
fields.description: Applies the “highlight” promotion onto the listing. Only permitted in categories that support this promotion. Whether or not it’s available in a category can be confirmed using the Fees API endpoint. Note that a discount may be applicable if all the feature combo promotions are specified (feature, bold, highlight and gallery). Also note that promotions cannot be removed from a listing.

fields.name: HasSuperFeature
fields.description: Applies the “super feature” promotion onto the listing. Only permitted in categories that support this promotion. Whether or not it’s available in a category can be confirmed using the Fees API endpoint. Note that when creating a new listing with the super feature promotion, the feature, bold, highlight and gallery promotions will automatically be applied. Also note that promotions cannot be removed from a listing.

fields.name: PhotoIds
fields.description: Photo IDs for images that have already been uploaded that you want to display on the listing. For all general items categories all photos are free (up to 20 max). Check the  category details API for exact details. Note that photos may be deleted if they are unused for too long. It is up to you to ensure that your photo IDs are valid. See our  photo retention policy for more information.

fields.name: ShippingOptions
fields.description: The shipping options to be displayed on the listing. Can contain up to ten shipping options. Mandatory for auctions, ignored for classifieds.

fields.name: Type
fields.type:
Type 
 Enumeration 

The type of delivery.



 Price 
 Number 

The price of the delivery option. Only applicable if ShippingType is Custom. Rounded up to the nearest 2 decimal places.



 Method 
 String or null 

The name of the delivery method (e.g. "NZ Courier", "Rural Delivery"). Only applicable if ShippingType is Custom.



 ShippingId 
 Integer 

The ID of the shipping option (used when bidding or for Buy Now). Not required when listing an item.
fields.description: Enumeration

fields.name: Type
fields.description: The type of delivery.

enum.name: None
enum.description: The type of the "None of the options apply to me" shipping option. Do not use when listing an item.

enum.name: Undecided
enum.description: Indicates that the seller will confirm the shipping details with the buyer directly. This shipping option cannot be used when Pay Now is specified as a payment option. When listing an item, this option cannot be used in combination with other shipping options.

enum.name: Pickup
enum.description: Indicates the item can be picked up. Do not use when listing an item (use thePickupfield instead).

enum.name: Free
enum.description: Indicates the item can be shipped for free within New Zealand. When listing an item, this option cannot be used in combination with other shipping options.

enum.name: Custom
enum.description: Custom shipping option. Allows the seller to specify the price and description. Multiple custom shipping options are allowed (up to ten).

enum.name: TradeMe
enum.description: Trademe shipping option. Allows the seller to calculate the quotes from couriers, all calculated quotes will be saved in custom shipping options.

fields.name: Price
fields.description: The price of the delivery option. Only applicable if ShippingType is Custom. Rounded up to the nearest 2 decimal places.

fields.name: Method
fields.description: The name of the delivery method (e.g. "NZ Courier", "Rural Delivery"). Only applicable if ShippingType is Custom.

fields.name: ShippingId
fields.description: The ID of the shipping option (used when bidding or for Buy Now). Not required when listing an item.

fields.name: PaymentMethods
fields.description: The acceptable payment methods to be displayed on the listing. Mandatory for auctions, ignored for classifieds.

enum.name: CreditCard
enum.description: Credit card. (Processed via Pay Now if the seller uses Pay Now, otherwise Buy Now)

fields.name: Attributes
fields.description: The attribute values for a listing. The attributes for a category can be found using the  category details API. Additionally, some API clients may supply any number of dynamic attributes i.e. name-value pairs as defined by the client Some well-known attribute names will also help users find your listings: Google Shopping Feed We include attributes that are named and correctly formatted in a feed that goes to Google Shopping. These are on the ProductSpecification section so include this data if you have it.

fields.name: Name
fields.type:
Name 
 String or null 

A name which uniquely identifies the attribute. Required when selling or editing.



 Value 
 String or null 

The string value of the attribute. When listing, the valid values for the attribute can be determined using the "Retrieve attributes for a category" API. Use "false" or "true" for boolean attributes. Required when selling or editing.



 Unit 
 String or null 

The selected unit. Only applicable to attributes that have at least one associated unit. This field is optional, but if supplied, will be saved along with the value. The list of valid units can be retrieved from the category details API.
fields.description: String or null

fields.name: Name
fields.description: A name which uniquely identifies the attribute. Required when selling or editing.

fields.name: Value
fields.description: The string value of the attribute. When listing, the valid values for the attribute can be determined using the "Retrieve attributes for a category" API. Use "false" or "true" for boolean attributes. Required when selling or editing.

fields.name: Unit
fields.description: The selected unit. Only applicable to attributes that have at least one associated unit. This field is optional, but if supplied, will be saved along with the value. The list of valid units can be retrieved from the category details API.

fields.name: IsClearance
fields.description: Indicates that the listing is a clearance item. Only applicable on auctions for members who have a Trade Me store. Ignored for classifieds.

fields.name: ExternalReferenceId
fields.description: Allows the API client to associate an identifier (or any short string) against the listing. This value can be searched on but is otherwise only accessible via the API. Not used by Trade Me. Optional. Max 50 characters.

fields.name: Contacts
fields.description: A list of contact details. Optional. Currently only applicable for property categories and property agents that have billing methods covering the type of category. For example to add contact details in the residential for rent category the agent must have residential for rent billing enabled.

fields.name: FullName
fields.type:
FullName 
 String or null 

The full name of the contact person or agent. Mandatory.



 PhoneNumber 
 String or null 

The phone number of the contact. Can be either a mobile or landline number. Optional.



 AlternatePhoneNumber 
 String or null 

The phone number of the contact. Can be either a mobile or landline number. This is the primary contact number on the Trade Me Apps. Optional.



 EMail 
 String or null 

The email address of the contact to be used for email enquiries. Optional.



 BrandingImageId 
 Integer 

The ID of the branding image to display an agent photo on this listing. See the  upload branding image API. Optional.



 AgencyName 
 String or null 

The agency name for the contact



 ShouldContact 
 Enumeration 

This shows whether the agent detail comes from I am an agent or contact my agent section
fields.description: String or null

fields.name: FullName
fields.description: The full name of the contact person or agent. Mandatory.

fields.name: PhoneNumber
fields.description: The phone number of the contact. Can be either a mobile or landline number. Optional.

fields.name: AlternatePhoneNumber
fields.description: The phone number of the contact. Can be either a mobile or landline number. This is the primary contact number on the Trade Me Apps. Optional.

fields.name: EMail
fields.description: The email address of the contact to be used for email enquiries. Optional.

fields.name: BrandingImageId
fields.description: The ID of the branding image to display an agent photo on this listing. See the  upload branding image API. Optional.

fields.name: AgencyName
fields.description: The agency name for the contact

fields.name: ShouldContact
fields.description: This shows whether the agent detail comes from I am an agent or contact my agent section

fields.name: DonationRecipient
fields.description: Indicates the user would like to round up their success fees to the nearest dollar and donate the difference to the selected charity.

enum.name: None
enum.description: The default charity identifier. Used if the user chose not to donate to a charity at all.

enum.name: ForestAndBird
enum.description: Donate to Forest and Bird's kiwis for kiwis program.

enum.name: OurPeopleOurCityFund
enum.description: Donate to Our People, Our City Fund.

fields.name: CatalogueId
fields.description: Used for listing catalogue items and is the catalogue ID of the DVD or Blu-ray that is being listed. There is a separate API for finding the catalogue ID using the name of the movie. Catalogue items (category 9232 or category 365) can change their catalogue id but cannot be changed from a catalogue listing to a non-catalogue listing.

fields.name: RemainingGalleryPlusRelists
fields.description: The number of times the item can be relisted and get the gallery promotion for free. Ignored when creating or editing a listing.

fields.name: PromotionId
fields.description: Indicates the promotion to apply to this listing. This ID can be retrieved using the category details API. When editing, promotions can only be upgraded, they cannot be downgraded.

fields.name: ExcludeFromShippingPromotion
fields.description: Exclude this listing from participating in the sellers shipping promotions.

fields.name: SKU
fields.description: SKU or Stock Keeping Unit. Used to uniquely identify an auction's product line. Maximum of 50 characters.

fields.name: AvailablePromotions
fields.description: The list of available promotional options for this listing. Only one promotional option can be selected. These are only available in categories where Super Grid has been enabled.

fields.name: Id
fields.type:
Id 
 Integer 

The unique identifier of the promotion.



 Name 
 String or null 

The name of the promotion.



 Description 
 String or null 

A short description of the promotion.



 Price 
 Number 

The current price of the promotion. This price should include any discounts currently applied.



 OriginalPrice 
 Number 

The price of the promotion before any discounts have been applied.



 Recommended 
 Boolean 

Whether this promotion is currently being recommended.



 MinimumPhotoCount 
 Integer 

The minimum number of photos required for the promotion.



 DiscountDescription 
 String or null 

A short description of any discount applied to this promotion.



 DiscountStartDate 
 String or null 

The start date of any discount applied to this promotion.



 DiscountEndDate 
 String or null 

The end date of any discount applied to this promotion.



 DiscountDisclaimer 
 String or null 

The legal disclaimer of any discount applied to this promotion.



 GoodFor2RelistsFee 
 Number 

The value of the GoodFor2Relists fee if eligible for this promotion.
fields.description: Integer

fields.name: Id
fields.description: The unique identifier of the promotion.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: The name of the promotion.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: A short description of the promotion.

fields.name: Price
fields.description: The current price of the promotion. This price should include any discounts currently applied.

fields.name: OriginalPrice
fields.description: The price of the promotion before any discounts have been applied.

fields.name: Recommended
fields.description: Whether this promotion is currently being recommended.

fields.name: MinimumPhotoCount
fields.description: The minimum number of photos required for the promotion.

fields.name: DiscountDescription
fields.description: A short description of any discount applied to this promotion.

fields.name: DiscountStartDate
fields.description: The start date of any discount applied to this promotion.

fields.name: DiscountEndDate
fields.description: The end date of any discount applied to this promotion.

fields.name: DiscountDisclaimer
fields.description: The legal disclaimer of any discount applied to this promotion.

fields.name: GoodFor2RelistsFee
fields.description: The value of the GoodFor2Relists fee if eligible for this promotion.

fields.name: ImmutableFields
fields.description: A collection of the names of various fields and attributes which cannot be changed under various conditions e.g. a bid has been placed on an Auction, or 7 days has passed after a classified was created.

fields.name: WasPrice
fields.description: The usual price that a product is sold at, or the price before it was marked down. This is always more than the Buy Now price for Auctions, or more than the asking price for Classifieds.

fields.name: EmbeddedContent
fields.description: The content keys that are embedded in the listing page (e.g. YouTube Video Key).Use the category details API to check which content types a category supports.

fields.name: YouTubeVideoKey
fields.type:
YouTubeVideoKey 
 String or null 

The YouTube video key for the listing.



 MatterportKey 
 String or null 

The Matterport video key for the listing's InsideView content.



 IStagingKey 
 String or null 

The IStaging video key for the listing's InsideView content.



 VimeoVideoKey 
 String or null 

The Vimeo video key for the listing.



 DiakritFurnishKey 
 String or null 

The Diakrit Furnish key for the listing.



 DiakritStylerKey 
 String or null 

The Diakrit Styler key for the listing.



 DiakritPanoramaKey 
 String or null 

The Diakrit Panorama key for the listing.



 VirtualToursCreatorKey 
 String or null 

The Virtual Tours Creator key for the listing.



 Approved3DTourUrl 
 String or null 

The Approved 3d tour url for the listing.
fields.description: String or null

fields.name: YouTubeVideoKey
fields.description: The YouTube video key for the listing.

fields.name: MatterportKey
fields.description: The Matterport video key for the listing's InsideView content.

fields.name: IStagingKey
fields.description: The IStaging video key for the listing's InsideView content.

fields.name: VimeoVideoKey
fields.description: The Vimeo video key for the listing.

fields.name: DiakritFurnishKey
fields.description: The Diakrit Furnish key for the listing.

fields.name: DiakritStylerKey
fields.description: The Diakrit Styler key for the listing.

fields.name: DiakritPanoramaKey
fields.description: The Diakrit Panorama key for the listing.

fields.name: VirtualToursCreatorKey
fields.description: The Virtual Tours Creator key for the listing.

fields.name: Approved3DTourUrl
fields.description: The Approved 3d tour url for the listing.

fields.name: IsBranded
fields.description: A flag indicating the listing should be branded. Only applicable to the Jobs category.

fields.name: ShortDescription
fields.description: Summary of the listing. Mandatory for Job listings Maximum of 150 characters.

fields.name: ShippingCalculatorInputs
fields.description: The criteria used within the Trade Me Shipping calculator to determine rates.

fields.name: IsBoxType
fields.type:
IsBoxType 
 Boolean or null 

Indicator if package type is bag or box



 Width

Width value for box package type



 Height

 Depth

 IsSignatureRequired

 PickupLocalityId 
 Integer or null 

Pickup location id



 IsRural 
 Boolean 

Indicator on if pickup location is rural area



 PackagingOption 
 Enumeration 

Packaging type indicating bag sizes or box



 WeightOption 
 Enumeration 

Weight range option for calculation



 FilterOption 
 Enumeration or null 

Courier filter for calculation

fields.description: Structured information for Listing Additional Data. Currently only used by featured Job listings.

Name

fields.name: VariantDefinition
fields.description: When specified, turns the listing request into a multi-variant listing that creates several child listings. The variants definition is used to describe the variant options that are available and the combinations of variants that make up the multi-variant listing.

fields.name: OptionSets
fields.type:
OptionSets 
 Collection of <OptionSet> or null 

A collection of variant options.






 Name 
 String or null 

The name used to identify the group of option values, e.g. "size" or "colour".



 Values 
 Collection of String or null 

The choices available for this option set, e.g. "red", "blue". The sequence in which values are supplied is reflected in the sequence of user-interface elements on listings.






 Variants 
 Collection of <Variant> or null 

A collection of variants.






 SKU 
 String or null 

SKU or Stock Keeping Unit. Used to uniquely identify an auction's product line. Maximum of 50 characters.



 Price 
 Number 

The Buy Now price of the variant. Must be a minimum of 50c.



 IsClearance 
 Boolean 

This indicates that the listing is a clearance item. Clearance listings include listings with was/now pricing and general clearance stock.



 WasPrice 
 Number or null 

The Was price of the variant. Must be a minimum of 50c.



 Quantity 
 Integer 

This is the quantity of items that are available for sale. Can be between 1 and 1000. Note that when editing, the value must be less than or equal to 1000 - (quantity sold). The quantity sold for a listing can be calculated by adding up all the QuantitySold values from the listing details response.



 Photos 
 Collection of <Photo> or null 

A collection of photo URLs for the listing. Ignored when creating or editing a listing.






 Key 
 Integer 




 Value 
 <PhotoUrl> or null 







 Thumbnail 
 String or null 

The URL for the thumbnail sized photo (always 85x64, with white borders).



 List 
 String or null 

The URL for the list view sized photo (scaled down to fit 160x120).



 Medium 
 String or null 

The URL for the medium sized photo (scaled down to fit 175x175).



 Gallery 
 String or null 

The URL for the gallery sized photo (scaled down to fit 233x176).



 Large 
 String or null 

The URL for the large sized photo (scaled down to fit 352x264).



 FullSize 
 String or null 

The URL for the full sized photo (scaled down to fit 670x502).



 PlusSize 
 String or null 

The URL for the plus sized photo (scaled down to fit).



 PhotoId 
 Integer 

The ID of the photo.









 Options 
 Collection of <Option> or null 

The combination of variant options that this variant represents.






 Name 
 String or null 

The name used to identify the group of option values, e.g. "size" or "colour". This name must match an entry in the option set collection.



 Value 
 String or null 

The choice that this variant has for the option, e.g. "red", "blue". This name must match an entry in the option set.






 Attributes 
 Collection of <Attribute> or null 

A collection of dynamic attributes that relate to this variant specifically. These can be any number of name-value pairs. Some well-known attribute names will also help users find your listings: Google Shopping Feed We include attributes that are named and correctly formatted in a feed that goes to Google Shopping. These are Brand, GTIN and Manufacturer Code so include this data if you have it.




                                 (This type has already been defined)
                        


 ListingId 
 Integer or null 

The identifier of the listing that this variant represents.



 ProductSpecification 
 <ProductSpecification> or null 

The specifications of the product if the variant relates to a product






 GTIN 
 String or null 

The GTIN of the product e.g. 027242896505 



 Brand 
 String or null 

The brand name of the product e.g. Sony 



 ManufacturerCode 
 String or null 

The product code used by the manufacturer e.g. KDL32W600D
fields.description: Collection of <OptionSet> or null

fields.name: OptionSets
fields.description: A collection of variant options.

fields.name: Name
fields.type:
Name 
 String or null 

The name used to identify the group of option values, e.g. "size" or "colour".



 Values 
 Collection of String or null 

The choices available for this option set, e.g. "red", "blue". The sequence in which values are supplied is reflected in the sequence of user-interface elements on listings.

fields.description: The choices available for this option set, e.g. "red", "blue". The sequence in which values are supplied is reflected in the sequence of user-interface elements on listings.

fields.name: Variants
fields.description: A collection of variants.

fields.name: SKU
fields.type:
SKU 
 String or null 

SKU or Stock Keeping Unit. Used to uniquely identify an auction's product line. Maximum of 50 characters.



 Price 
 Number 

The Buy Now price of the variant. Must be a minimum of 50c.



 IsClearance 
 Boolean 

This indicates that the listing is a clearance item. Clearance listings include listings with was/now pricing and general clearance stock.



 WasPrice 
 Number or null 

The Was price of the variant. Must be a minimum of 50c.



 Quantity 
 Integer 

This is the quantity of items that are available for sale. Can be between 1 and 1000. Note that when editing, the value must be less than or equal to 1000 - (quantity sold). The quantity sold for a listing can be calculated by adding up all the QuantitySold values from the listing details response.



 Photos 
 Collection of <Photo> or null 

A collection of photo URLs for the listing. Ignored when creating or editing a listing.






 Key 
 Integer 




 Value 
 <PhotoUrl> or null 







 Thumbnail 
 String or null 

The URL for the thumbnail sized photo (always 85x64, with white borders).



 List 
 String or null 

The URL for the list view sized photo (scaled down to fit 160x120).



 Medium 
 String or null 

The URL for the medium sized photo (scaled down to fit 175x175).



 Gallery 
 String or null 

The URL for the gallery sized photo (scaled down to fit 233x176).



 Large 
 String or null 

The URL for the large sized photo (scaled down to fit 352x264).



 FullSize 
 String or null 

The URL for the full sized photo (scaled down to fit 670x502).



 PlusSize 
 String or null 

The URL for the plus sized photo (scaled down to fit).



 PhotoId 
 Integer 

The ID of the photo.









 Options 
 Collection of <Option> or null 

The combination of variant options that this variant represents.






 Name 
 String or null 

The name used to identify the group of option values, e.g. "size" or "colour". This name must match an entry in the option set collection.



 Value 
 String or null 

The choice that this variant has for the option, e.g. "red", "blue". This name must match an entry in the option set.






 Attributes 
 Collection of <Attribute> or null 

A collection of dynamic attributes that relate to this variant specifically. These can be any number of name-value pairs. Some well-known attribute names will also help users find your listings: Google Shopping Feed We include attributes that are named and correctly formatted in a feed that goes to Google Shopping. These are Brand, GTIN and Manufacturer Code so include this data if you have it.




                                 (This type has already been defined)
                        


 ListingId 
 Integer or null 

The identifier of the listing that this variant represents.



 ProductSpecification 
 <ProductSpecification> or null 

The specifications of the product if the variant relates to a product






 GTIN 
 String or null 

The GTIN of the product e.g. 027242896505 



 Brand 
 String or null 

The brand name of the product e.g. Sony 



 ManufacturerCode 
 String or null 

The product code used by the manufacturer e.g. KDL32W600D
fields.description: String or null

fields.name: SKU
fields.description: SKU or Stock Keeping Unit. Used to uniquely identify an auction's product line. Maximum of 50 characters.

fields.name: Price
fields.description: The Buy Now price of the variant. Must be a minimum of 50c.

fields.name: IsClearance
fields.description: This indicates that the listing is a clearance item. Clearance listings include listings with was/now pricing and general clearance stock.

fields.name: WasPrice
fields.description: The Was price of the variant. Must be a minimum of 50c.

fields.name: Quantity
fields.description: This is the quantity of items that are available for sale. Can be between 1 and 1000. Note that when editing, the value must be less than or equal to 1000 - (quantity sold). The quantity sold for a listing can be calculated by adding up all the QuantitySold values from the listing details response.

fields.description: String or null

fields.name: GTIN
fields.description: The GTIN of the product e.g. 027242896505

fields.name: Brand
fields.description: The brand name of the product e.g. Sony

fields.name: ManufacturerCode
fields.description: The product code used by the manufacturer e.g. KDL32W600D

fields.name: SecondCategory
fields.description: The ID of the second category to list the item in. For example, specify "6853" to list an oil heater. This field also accepts the MCAT category format (e.g. "0004-0370-0560-6853-"). Not all categories can be used as a second category and not all primary categories can be paired with a second category.

fields.name: PremiumPackageCode
fields.description: The code of the premium package to apply to the listing. This will be null if a package is not applied to the listing or a package was previously applied but has since completed.

fields.name: ProductSpecification
fields.description: The specifications of the product if the listing relates to a product. If this is a multi-variant product, specify these in the Variants section.

fields.name: ListingExtrasLedger
fields.description: A collection of extras that have been applied to the listing. This is an output field. We will provide Id, Name, Variant, StartDate, & EndDate. Any changes to this collection is ignored when creating or editing a listing.

fields.name: HasGoodFor2Relists
fields.description: Indicates if Good For 2 Relists is included with the premium package.

fields.name: IsCounterOffersAllowed
fields.description: Indicates if Make an Offer is enabled or not. true is enabled, false is disabled and null means it hasn't set yet.

fields.name: MaximumOffers
fields.description: The maximum number of Buyer offers the listing accepts if the listing has Counter Offers enabled.

fields.name: ShippingTemplateId
fields.description: The identifier of the shipping template containing the shipping options. For the shipping template to be successfully applied to the listing, there are some requirements to be met with the api request: The listing must be a Buy Now Only listing: Must have: - A quantity > 0 - A buy now price - Shipping field = 0 (or the field not supplied) Must not have: - A reserve price - A starting price - Any custom shipping options supplied - Pickup only The primary and/or secondary category supplied must be Marketplace categories. When the above requirements are not met when specifying a ShippingTemplateId, then the listing request will fail.Identifying marketplace categories You can identify these categories by using the following endpoint:Category Details When AreaOfBusiness = 1 (marketplace category)

fields.description: A collection of photo URLs for the listing. Ignored when creating or editing a listing.

fields.description: Name of the file

fields.name: ListingId
fields.description: The ID of the listing to edit.

fields.name: RequiredMinimumReserve
fields.description: The required minimum value for the Reserve field. This property will be returned when a listing has bids on it but has not yet met reserve. This field should not be set by consumers.

fields.name: HasBeenExtended
fields.description: Specifically exposed to be used by motor sell app, not public api

fields.name: StartDate
fields.description: The start date of the listing to edit. This field should not be set by consumers. Ignored on POST requests.
